languages.text: "Потому что я верю, что хотя бы часть этих заблудших душ еще можно спасти и вернуть к свету Его! Я не готов предать огню весь сноп, не отделив зерна от плевел. Но не буду лгать — даже меня обуревают сомнения, когда я смотрю на царящую здесь ересь".

traits.locale_text: "Потому что я верю, что хотя бы часть этих заблудших душ еще можно спасти и вернуть к свету Его! Я не готов предать огню весь сноп, не отделив зерна от плевел. Не буду лгать — даже меня обуревают сомнения, когда я смотрю на масштаб происходящего".

languages.text: "Because I believe that at least some of these lost souls can still be saved and returned to His light! I would separate the wheat from the chaff, not put the whole sheaf to the fire. But I will not lie — even I am given to doubt when I look at the heresy that reigns supreme in this place."
languages.original_text: "Потому что я верю, что хотя бы часть этих заблудших душ еще можно спасти и вернуть к свету Его! Я не готов предать огню весь сноп, не отделив зерна от плевел. Но не буду лгать — даже меня обуревают сомнения, когда я смотрю на царящую здесь ересь".

traits.locale_text: "Because I believe that at least some of these lost souls can still be saved and returned to His light! I would separate the wheat from the chaff, not put the whole sheaf to the fire. But I will not lie; even I am given to doubt when I look at the heresy that reigns supreme in this place."

"Because I believe that at least some of these lost souls can still be saved and returned to His light! I would separate the wheat from the chaff, not put the whole sheaf to the fire. But I will not lie; even I am given to doubt when I look at the heresy that reigns supreme in this place."

"Because I believe that at least some of these lost souls can still be saved and returned to His light! I would separate the wheat from the chaff, not put the whole sheaf to the fire. But I would not lie; even I am given to doubt when I look at the heresy that reigns supreme in this place."

"Because I believe that at least some of these lost souls can still be saved and returned to His light! I would separate the wheat from the chaff, not put the whole sheaf to the fire. But I would not lie; even I am given to doubt when I look at the heresy that reigns supreme in this place."

"Because I believe that at least some of these lost souls can still be saved and returned to His light! I would separate the wheat from the chaff, not put the whole sheaf to the fire. But I will not lie — even I am given to doubt when I look at the heresy that reigns supreme in this place."

"Because I believe that at least some of these lost souls can still be saved and returned to His light! I would separate the wheat from the chaff, not put the whole sheaf to the fire. But I will not lie — even I am given to doubt when I look at the heresy that reigns supreme in this place."

languages.text: “因为我相信，哪怕是在那些迷失的灵魂中，也肯定有一部分仍然值得拯救，重归帝皇的光辉之下！我愿意把麦子和糠分开，不会把整堆麦子都丢进火里。不过我也得承认，即便是我，看到这里的异端邪说这么猖獗的时候，心里也不禁产生了怀疑。”
languages.original_text: "Because I believe that at least some of these lost souls can still be saved and returned to His light! I would separate the wheat from the chaff, not put the whole sheaf to the fire. But I will not lie — even I am given to doubt when I look at the heresy that reigns supreme in this place."

traits.locale_text: “因为我相信，哪怕是在那些迷失的灵魂中，也肯定有一部分仍然值得拯救，重归帝皇的光辉之下！我愿意把麦子和糠分开，不会把整堆麦子都丢进火里。不过我也得承认，即便是我，看到这里的异端邪说这么猖獗的时候，我也不禁产生了怀疑。”

languages.text: 「道に迷った魂の中にはまだ救える者もいるんだと、そして、主の光に戻れる者もいるんだと、信じているからだ！私は麦と籾殻を分けたいのであって、麦束全体を火にかけるつもりはない。だが正直なところ、この地に君臨する異端を目の当たりにすると、疑いざるを得ない」
languages.original_text: "Because I believe that at least some of these lost souls can still be saved and returned to His light! I would separate the wheat from the chaff, not put the whole sheaf to the fire. But I will not lie — even I am given to doubt when I look at the heresy that reigns supreme in this place."

traits.locale_text: 「道に迷った魂の中にはまだ救える者もいるんだと、そして、主の光に戻れる者もいるんだと、信じているからだ！私は麦と籾殻を分けたいのであって、麦束全体を火にかけるつもりはない。だが正直なところ、この地に君臨する異端を目の当たりにすると、疑いざるを得ない」

languages.text: «¡Porque creo que al menos algunas de esas almas perdidas todavía pueden ser salvadas y devueltas a Su luz! Yo separaría el trigo de la paja, no pondría toda la gavilla en el fuego; pero seré sincero: incluso a mí me asalta la duda cuando contemplo la herejía que reina en este lugar».
languages.original_text: "Because I believe that at least some of these lost souls can still be saved and returned to His light! I would separate the wheat from the chaff, not put the whole sheaf to the fire. But I will not lie — even I am given to doubt when I look at the heresy that reigns supreme in this place."

traits.locale_text: «¡Porque creo que al menos algunas de esas almas perdidas todavía pueden ser salvadas y devueltas a Su luz! Yo separaría el trigo de la paja, no pondría toda la gavilla en el fuego; pero no miento si digo que incluso a mí me asalta la duda cuando contemplo la herejía que reina en este lugar».

languages.text: "Weil ich überzeugt bin, dass zumindest einige dieser verlorenen Seelen noch gerettet und zurück in sein Licht geholt werden können! Ich will die Spreu vom Weizen trennen, nicht das ganze Büschel in Brand stecken. Aber ich werde nicht lügen: Selbst mir kommen Zweifel angesichts der Ketzerei, die hier vorherrscht."
languages.original_text: "Because I believe that at least some of these lost souls can still be saved and returned to His light! I would separate the wheat from the chaff, not put the whole sheaf to the fire. But I will not lie — even I am given to doubt when I look at the heresy that reigns supreme in this place."

traits.locale_text: "Weil ich überzeugt bin, dass zumindest einige dieser verlorenen Seelen noch gerettet und zurück in sein Licht geholt werden können! Ich will die Spreu vom Weizen trennen, nicht das ganze Büschel in Brand stecken. Aber ich werde nicht lügen: Selbst mir kommen Zweifel angesichts der Ketzerei, die hier vorherrscht."

languages.text: « Parce que je reste persuadé qu'au moins une partie de ces âmes peut être sauvée et ramenée dans Sa lumière ! Je me risquerais à séparer le bon grain de l'ivraie plutôt que d'incendier toute la grange. Cela dit, quand je vois l'hérésie qui règne ici... je ne vous cache pas qu'il m'arrive de douter. »
languages.original_text: "Because I believe that at least some of these lost souls can still be saved and returned to His light! I would separate the wheat from the chaff, not put the whole sheaf to the fire. But I will not lie — even I am given to doubt when I look at the heresy that reigns supreme in this place."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que je reste persuadé qu'au moins une partie de ces âmes peut être sauvée et ramenée dans Sa lumière ! Je me risquerais à séparer le bon grain de l'ivraie plutôt que d'incendier toute la grange. Cela dit, quand je vois l'hérésie qui règne ici... je ne vous cacherai pas qu'il m'arrive de douter. »

languages.text: "Çünkü bu kayıp ruhların en azından bir kısmının hâlâ kurtarılabileceğine ve O'nun ışığına döndürülebileceğine inanıyorum! Tüm balyayı ateşe atmıyor, sapla samanı ayırıyorum. Ama yalan söylemeyeceğim, bu yerde hüküm süren kâfirliğe baktıkça benim bile içim şüpheyle doluyor."
languages.original_text: "Because I believe that at least some of these lost souls can still be saved and returned to His light! I would separate the wheat from the chaff, not put the whole sheaf to the fire. But I will not lie — even I am given to doubt when I look at the heresy that reigns supreme in this place."

traits.locale_text: "Çünkü bu kayıp ruhların en azından bir kısmının hâlâ kurtarılabileceğine ve O'nun ışığına döndürülebileceğine inanıyorum! Tüm balyayı ateşe atmıyor, sapla samanı ayırıyorum. Ama yalan söylemeyeceğim, bu yerde hüküm süren kâfirliğe baktıkça benim bile içim şüpheyle doluyor."
